entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a student who is nervous about her exams and has failed some of them. She is described as muttering feverishly and flapping her hands hysterically.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a student who is also nervous about his exams and tells Hermione to shut up.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a student who asks what happens if they fail their exams.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as a patient and understanding person who tries to reassure Hermione.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as the Head of House who Hermione asked about what happens if they fail their exams.

relationships.description: Harry asks Professor McGonagall what happens if they fail their exams.
Hermione asked Professor McGonagall about what happens if they fail their exams.
